GraspIt! Developer Documentation

2.1.0

These pages document the GraspIt! source code. Please remember this is research code. There are still plenty of pieces of code that are unfinished and several bugs that need to be fixed.

More information and original source code for the packages included with GraspIt! can be found in the following places:

  • qhull: http://www.qhull.org
  • maxdet: http://www.stanford.edu/~boyd/old_software/MAXDET.html
  • tinyxml: http://www.grinninglizard.com/tinyxml/
